description: Fraxure, known as the Axe Jaw Pok√©mon, is the evolution of Axew. It is based on the dinosaurs and has tusks capable of breaking rocks into pieces. A Fraxure will sharpen its tusks after fighting since they will not regrow if they break. If a Fraxure gets into a territorial battle with another Fraxure, the encounter can be very violent.
name: Onondo
